actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Jury Selection and Service Act of 1968, as amended, to clarify the qualification section of that act with regard to service by persons whose civil rights have been restored.

summary.text: Allows a person whose civil rights have been restored by pardon, amnesty, or otherwise to serve on grand and petit juries in Federal district courts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Jury Selection and Service Act of 1968, as amended, to clarify the qualification section of that act with regard to service by persons whose civil rights have been restored.
